europeana:record.dc:title: Three new genera of Braconinae from the Afrotropical region (Hymenoptera: Braconidae)
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Achterberg, van C.
Sigwalt B.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Insecta
Braconidae; Braconinae; Kenema; Commatapsis; Bicentra; Iphibracon; keys; Afrotropical; Malagasy
europeana:record.dc:description: Three new genera and species from the Afrotropical region are described and fully illustrated. Bicentra (type-species: B. concavitarsis spec. nov. from Zimbabwe), Commatapsis (type-species: C. cyanea spec. nov. from Guinea) and Iphibracon (type-speies: I. flavovariegata spec. nov. from Malagasy). A new species of the genus Kenema (K. serrata from Senegal) is described and a key to the species of the genus Kenema Van Achterberg is added.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Three new genera of Braconinae from the Afrotropical region (Hymenoptera: Braconidae) (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 61) (Issue 31)
